text: How far do you reckon you'd be happy to travel? It definitely makes a difference to your quality of life. I had a job where I had a 2 hours commute each way :weary: and i quit after 9 months ... having said that I'm glad I made the effort because I learned so much on that job & it was more senior than my previous role so it helped me be able to ask for a bigger salary at the next job!!
